testcase.name: PEBL-2610-1
testcase.summary: To Verify if the Select Drop down appears in front Conversion Page

step.actions: 1. Launch Admin 2. Navigate to Marketing > A/B Testing 3. Click on Add new Test from Actions Menu 4. Observe the Select Drop Down in front of Conversion Page field
step.expectedresults: A drop down should be there with Conversion Page text box

testcase.name: PEBL-3137-1
testcase.summary: Verify directly navigated to content page without navigating to Home page
testcase.preconditions: 1. Launch Admin Application. 2. Navigate to Sites > Home > Display 3. Create Display Test1 Status : Inactive A/B Testing Override: Inactive 4. Navigate to Marketing > A/B testing 5. Create New Page type Test for Home Page using Display 'Test1' 6. Activate and assign 100% Traffic

step.actions: 1. Launch B2C Application 2. Navigated to a content page directly e.g. http://localhost:8080/category/%5Ben_us%5Dcategory2%5Ben_us%5D/%5Ben_us%5Dsub+category+2%5Ben_us%5D.do 3. Navigated to an invalid page that will result in an error e.g. funky.do 4. Navigated back to content page 5. Verify cookies
step.expectedresults: No cookies for ABTest should be generated yet as we have not navigated to Home Page yet

testcase.name: PEBL-2610-2
testcase.summary: Verify seed data Tests are updated correctly with Select Drop down options

step.actions: 1. Launch Admin 2. Navigate to Marketing > A/B Testing 3. Verify Select Drop Down options for existing Tests
step.expectedresults: Select Drop Down option values are displayed correctly

testcase.name: PEBL-3137-2
testcase.summary: Verify directly navigated to error page without navigating to Home page
testcase.preconditions: 1. Launch Admin Application. 2. Navigate to Sites > Home > Display 3. Create Display Test1 Status : Inactive A/B Testing Override: Inactive 4. Navigate to Marketing > A/B testing 5. Create New Page type Test for Home Page using Display 'Test1' 6. Activate and assign 100% Traffic

step.actions: 1. Launch B2C Application 2. Directly navigated to funky.do // invalid page 3. Its redirected to error page 4. Verify cookies
step.expectedresults: No cookies for ABTest should be generated yet as we have not navigated to Home Page yet

testcase.name: PEBL-2610-3
testcase.summary: To Verify if by default , Path Only is displayed in the Select drop down for Conversion Page

step.actions: 1. Launch Admin 2. Navigate to Marketing > A/B Testing 3. Click on Add new Test from Actions Menu 4. Observe the Select Drop Down in front of Conversion Page field 5,. Verify default option displayed
step.expectedresults: Dropdown should have " Path Only " displayed by default.

testcase.name: PEBL-3137-3
testcase.summary: Verify that the text box with the correct labelling is being displayed along with the Go button when user expands the 'Quick Content Search link
testcase.preconditions: 1. Launch Admin Application. 2. Navigate to Sites > Home > Display 3. Create Display Test1 Status : Inactive A/B Testing Override: Inactive 4. Navigate to Marketing > A/B testing 5. Create New Page type Test for Home Page using Display 'Test1' 6. Activate and assign 100% Traffic

step.actions: 1. Launch B2C Application 2. Go directly to sub category page with no cookies 3. Go to product 4. Go to home.do 5. Go back to sub category page 6. Verify cookies it should not be in a control group
step.expectedresults: Test Version should not be displayed not Control Group

testcase.name: PEBL-3677-5
testcase.summary: Add New Test Window Verify Elements of Control Version are copied while creating other Versions for Element Tests

step.actions: 1. Launch Admin 2. Navigate to Marketing > A/B Testing 3. Click on Add new Test from Actions Menu 4. Click on Element radio button under Test Type 5. Fill all the Mandatory Information 7. Click on Select button for Control Version to Select Control Version Elements 8. Select Elements from Element Selector Window and Press Ok 9. Verify Read Only Control Version displayed 10. Now Select "Add New Version.." button 11. Verify New Version got created with same Element as Control Version
step.expectedresults: Elements of Control Version are copied correctly for other Versions for Element Tests

testcase.name: PEBL-2610-4
testcase.summary: To Verify the values in the Select Drop down

step.actions: 1. Launch Admin 2. Navigate to Marketing > A/B Testing 3. Click on Add new Test from Actions Menu 4. Observe the Select Drop Down in front of Conversion Page field 5. Click on the Select drop down of Conversion Page field and observe the Options in the dropdown
step.expectedresults: Dropdown should have Values "Path Only" " Path & Query String" " Regular Expression"

testcase.name: PEBL-3677-6
testcase.summary: Add New Test Window Verify Version other than Control Version are editable for Element Tests

step.actions: 1. Launch Admin 2. Navigate to Marketing > A/B Testing 3. Click on Add new Test from Actions Menu 4. Click on Element radio button under Test Type 5. Fill all the Mandatory Information 7. Click on Select button for Control Version to Select Control Version Elements 8. Select Elements from Element Selector Window and Press Ok 9. Verify Read Only Control Version displayed 10. Now Select "Add New Version.." button 11. Verify New Version got created with same Element as Control Version 12. Now try to Edit Test Version 13. Verify Version other than Control Version are editable for Element Tests
step.expectedresults: Version other than Control Version are editable for Element Tests

testcase.name: PEBL-3137-4
testcase.summary: Verify directly navigated to other error page without navigating to Home page
testcase.preconditions: 1. Launch Admin Application. 2. Navigate to Sites > Home > Display 3. Create Display Test1 Status : Inactive A/B Testing Override: Inactive 4. Navigate to Marketing > A/B testing 5. Create New Page type Test for Home Page using Display 'Test1' 6. Activate and assign 100% Traffic

step.actions: 1. Launch B2C Application 2. Navigated to other jump.do // invalid page 3. e.g. /jump.do?itemType=ErrorPasswordReset 4. ump.do?itemType=No Search Results 5. You are on /jump.do page 6. Check cookies
step.expectedresults: No cookies for ABTest should be generated yet as we have not navigated to Home Page yet

testcase.name: PEBL-3677-7
testcase.summary: Saved Test Verify Elements of Control Version are non-editable on Saved Test

step.actions: 1. Launch Admin 2. Navigate to Marketing > A/B Testing 3. Click on Add new Test from Actions Menu 4. Click on Element radio button under Test Type 5. Fill all the Mandatory Information 7. Click on Select button for Control Version to Select Control Version Elements 8. Select Elements from Element Selector Window and Press Ok 9. Now Select "Add New Version.." button 11. Verify New Version got created with same Element as Control Version 12. Save Test 13. Verify Elements of Control Version are non-editable on Saved Test
step.expectedresults: Elements of Control Version are non-editable on Saved Test

testcase.name: PEBL-2610-5
testcase.summary: Verify Select Drop down option can be updated for existing test

step.actions: 1. Launch Admin 2. Navigate to Marketing > A/B Testing 3. Click on any existing test 4. Modify Select Drop Down option and try to Save
step.expectedresults: Updated Select Drop down value updated correctly

testcase.name: PEBL-3677-8
testcase.summary: Saved Test Verify Elements of Test Version are editable on Saved Test

step.actions: 1. Launch Admin 2. Navigate to Marketing > A/B Testing 3. Click on Add new Test from Actions Menu 4. Click on Element radio button under Test Type 5. Fill all the Mandatory Information 7. Click on Select button for Control Version to Select Control Version Elements 8. Select Elements from Element Selector Window and Press Ok 9. Now Select "Add New Version.." button 11. Verify New Version got created with same Element as Control Version 12. Save Test 13. Verify Elements of Test Version are editable on Saved Test
step.expectedresults: Elements of Test Version are editable on Saved Test

testcase.name: PEBL-3137-5
testcase.summary: Verify navigated to Directory then Home page and again navigated to Directory page should not be in control group
testcase.preconditions: 1. Launch Admin Application. 2. Navigate to Sites > Home > Display 3. Create Display Test1 Status : Inactive A/B Testing Override: Inactive 4. Navigate to Marketing > A/B testing 5. Create New Page type Test for Home Page using Display 'Test1' 6. Activate and assign 100% Traffic

step.actions: 1. Launch B2C Application 2. Go to category page clear cookies 3. Go to home - check cookies - no abtest cookies which is as expected 4. Go to another category page 5. Check cookies
step.expectedresults: ABTest Version cookies should displayed

testcase.name: PEBL-3677-9
testcase.summary: Verify alignment of Read Only Control Version Elements

step.actions: 1. Launch Admin Application 2. Navigate to Marketing > A/B Testing > Add New Test 3. Fill Required information 4. Select Page Type as "Element" 5. Enter Test Page as /home.do 6. Enter Conversion URL as /basket.do 7. Click on Select button to select Control Version Elements 8. From Element Selector window select multiple Elements 9. e.g. I have selected Company Logo and Fillslot and Press Ok
step.expectedresults: Alignment of Control Version Elements is correct

testcase.name: PEBL-2610-6
testcase.summary: To Verify if a new test can be saved with Path only option

step.actions: 1. Launch Admin 2. Navigate to Marketing > A/B Testing 3. Click on Add new Test from Actions Menu 4. Fill all the mandatory's ,set Test Page as Home Page. 5. Select "Path Only" option from the Select drop down of Conversion Page field 6. Enter Conversion URL as (/category/%5Ben_us%5Dcategory1%5Ben_us%5D.do) 7. Add Test Version and Select Display from Display selector and Save Changes
step.expectedresults: Test with "Path Only" option should get saved

testcase.name: PEBL-3677-10
testcase.summary: Verify Name for Read Only Control Version displayed for Element Tests

step.actions: 1. Launch Admin 2. Navigate to Marketing > A/B Testing 3. Click on Add new Test from Actions Menu 4. Click on Element radio button under Test Type 5. Verify Name for Read Only Control Version
step.expectedresults: Name displayed as "Control" for Read Only Control Version

testcase.name: PEBL-3137-6
testcase.summary: Active AB Test Version should not be displayed and user should get directed to error page when Test is Active and error page hit on B2C

step.actions:
1. Launch Admin Application. 2. Navigate to Sites > Home > Display 3. Create Test1 Status : Inactive A/B Testing Override: Inactive
4. Navigate to Marketing > A/B testing 5. Create New Page type Test for Home Page using Display 'Test1' 6. Activate and assign 100% Traffic
7. Launch B2C Application 8. Navigate to Category 1 > Sub Category 1 > 2155 Product Detail Page
9. From Admin Inactive 2155 and Save Changes
10 On B2C Refresh 2155 Detail Page 11. URL redirected to Error page i.e. http://ml50ha2.marketlive.com/jump.do?itemType=Error4012. Verify Error page displayed correctly
step.expectedresults: Error page with text "We're sorry, but the page you are looking for cannot be accessed. It may have been removed, had its name changed, or may be temporarily unavailable. ......." should be displayed

testcase.name: PEBL-3677-11
testcase.summary: Verify elements to Read Only Control Version can be added but their content should not be edited

step.actions: 1. Launch Admin 2. Navigate to Marketing > A/B Testing 3. Click on Add new Test from Actions Menu 4. Click on Element radio button under Test Type 5. Verify Read Only Control Version displayed 6. Verify elements to Read Only Control Version can be added but their content should not be edited
step.expectedresults: Elements to Read Only Control Version can be added but their content are not editable

testcase.name: PEBL-3137-7
testcase.summary: If Active Display is present with A/B Testing Override true, Active Test should not be displayed in cookies and count also should not be increased in Admin

step.actions:
1. Launch Admin Application. 2. Navigate to Sites > Home > Display 3. Create Test1 Status : Inactive A/B Testing Override: Inactive
Create Test2 Status : Active A/B Testing Override: Active
4. Navigate to Marketing > A/B testing 5. Create New Page type Test for Home Page using Display 'Test1' 6. Activate and assign 100% Traffic 7. On B2C Delete Cookies and navigate to Home Page 8. Verify Test2 (Active) Display displayed which is as expected 9. Click on any other page 10. Verify Cookies
step.expectedresults: As active Display was present AB Test have not been called yet so in Cookies AB Test version should not be displayed

testcase.name: PEBL-3677-12
testcase.summary: Add New Test Verify Version Elements Displayed correctly after adding/deleting Versions

step.actions: 1. Launch Admin Application 2. Navigate to Marketing > A/B Testing > Add New Test 3. Fill Required information 4. Select Page Type as "Element" 5. Enter Test Page as /home.do 6. Enter Conversion URL as /basket.do 7. Click on Select button to select Control Version Elements 8. From Element Selector window select Element 9. Now Click on 'Add Another Version..' button 10. Verify new Version got created with same elements 11. Now Remove this newly created Test Version 12. Again Click on 'Add Another Version..' button
step.expectedresults: Version Elements displayed correctly

testcase.name: PEBL-2610-8
testcase.summary: To Verify if a test can be saved with Path & Query String option

step.actions: 1. Launch Admin 2. Navigate to Marketing > A/B Testing 3. Click on Add new Test from Actions Menu 4. Fill all the mandatory's ,set Test Page as Home Page. 5. Select "Path & Query String" option from the Select drop down of Conversion Page field 6. Enter Conversion URL as (/product/%5Ben_us%5Decoclear+2000++%281450+gph%29%5Ben_us%5D.do?sortby=our Picks) 7. Add Test Version and Select Display from Display selector and Save Changes
step.expectedresults: Test having "Path & Query String" option should get saved in Admin

testcase.name: PEBL-3677-13
testcase.summary: Saved Test Verify "Add Another Version.." button enabled and user can add another version to existing Tests

step.actions: 1. Launch Admin Application 2. Navigate to Marketing > A/B Testing 3. Click on any existing Element Test having Control Version as well as Test Version 5. Verify 'Add Another Version..' button
step.expectedresults: "Add Another Version.." button enabled and user can add another version to existing Tests

testcase.name: PEBL-3137-8
testcase.summary: Verify Total Purchases amount displayed correctly once Control Version is in session

step.actions:
Pre-requisite: Set Test Version=50% and Control=50%, delete cookies and execute following steps:
1. Navigated to funky.do // invalid page 2, Verified Cookies, No cookies generated yet as I have not navigated to Home Page 3. Now in same session add any product into basket 4. Proceed into Checkout and Submit Order 5. Total Purchased is not displayed under any of Test in Admin i.e. neither on Test Version nor to Control Version which is as expected 6. Now clicked on Continue Shopping and Navigate to Home Page 7. Now Control Version started displayed in Cookies but previous Amount Purchased is still not displayed 8. Submit one more order this time new Amount should get displayed under Total Purchases in Admin for Control Version
step.expectedresults: Once control version is in session Amount Purchased should start displaying under Control Version in Admin

testcase.name: PEBL-3677-14
testcase.summary:
Saved Test
Verify Version Elements Displayed correctly after adding/deleting Versions

step.actions: 1. Launch Admin Application 2. Navigate to Marketing > A/B Testing 3. Click on any existing Element Test having Control Version as well as Test Version 5. Now Click on 'Add Another Version..' button 10. Verify new Version got created with same elements 11. Now Remove this newly created Test Version 12. Again Click on 'Add Another Version..' button
step.expectedresults: Version Elements displayed correctly for Saved Test

testcase.name: PEBL-2612-1
testcase.summary: Test participants can not increment counters by spanning multiple sessions for "Page Type Test" with "A/B Test Version" in session
testcase.preconditions: A/B test Version for Page Type Test in session

step.actions: 1. Launch Admin Applications 2. Navigate to Sites > Home > Display 3. Add Page Display and assign different elements to display 4. Navigate to Admin - Marketing - A/B testing - Details Tab 5. Create Page Type Test for newly created Display 6. Save Test, Assign Traffic and Activate Test 7. Clear cookies and Launch B2C Application 8. Verify Page Type Test displayed on B2C 9. Verify in Admin Unique and Total Traffic is increased by one 10. Now from Cookies check JSESSIONID, now delete JSESSIONID and again launch Home Page
step.expectedresults: 1. Verify Unique Traffic should not be increased in new session 2. Verify only Total Traffic should be increased

testcase.name: PEBL-3677-15
testcase.summary: Saved Test Verify Preview Link is displayed correctly for Version Elements and clicking on that correct Preview is displayed

step.actions: 1. Launch Admin Application 2. Navigate to Marketing > A/B Testing 3. Click on any existing Element Test having Control Version as well as Test Version 5. Verify Preview Link in front of Test Version 6. Now click on Preview Link 7. Verify correct Preview is displayed 8. Click on Close button to close Preview Window
step.expectedresults: Preview Link is displayed correctly for Version Elements and clicking on that correct Preview is displayed

testcase.name: PEBL-2610-10
testcase.summary: To Verify if a new test can be saved with Regular Expression option

step.actions:
1. Launch Admin
2. Navigate to Marketing > A/B Testing
3. Click on Add new Test from Actions Menu
4. Fill all the mandatory's ,set Test Page as Home Page.
5. Select "Regualr Expression" option from the Select drop down of Conversion Page field
6. Enter Conversion URL as /category/%5Ben_us%5Dcategory1%5Ben_us%5D/%5Ben_us%5Dsubcategory[123]%5Ben_us%5D.do
7. Add Test Version and Select Display from Display selector and Save Changes
step.expectedresults: Test having "Regular Expression" option should get saved

testcase.name: PEBL-3677-16
testcase.summary: Element Type Test - Verify Control Version is displayed under Execution Tab for Elements Test

step.actions: 1. Launch Admin Applications 2. Navigate to Admin - Marketing - A/B testing - Details Tab 3. Create Element Type Test 4. Click on Execution Tab
step.expectedresults: 1. Verify Control Version is displayed for Element Tests

testcase.name: PEBL-2612-2
testcase.summary:
Test participants can not increment counters by spanning multiple sessions for
"Page Type Test" with "Control Version" in session

step.actions: 1. Launch Admin Applications 2. Navigate to Sites > Home > Display 3. Add Page Display and assign different elements to display 4. Navigate to Admin - Marketing - A/B testing - Details Tab 5. Create Page Type Test for newly created Display 6. Now from Cookies check JSESSIONID, now delete JSESSIONID and again launch Home Page
step.expectedresults: 1. Verify Unique Traffic should not be increased in new session 2. Verify only Total Traffic should be increased

step.expectedresults: 1. Preview link is not present for control version

Now from Cookies check JSESSIONID, now delete JSESSIONID and again launch Home Page
step.expectedresults: 1. Verify Unique Traffic should not be increased in new session 2. Verify only Total Traffic should be increased

testcase.summary: Control Version - Name - Default Value

testcase.name: PEBL-3677-19
testcase.summary: Verify Total Traffic, Unique Traffic, Test Conversion & Total Purchases gets incremented correctly for Element - Control Version

step.actions: 1. Launch Admin Applications 2. Navigate to Admin - Marketing - A/B testing - Details Tab 3. Create Element Type Test 4. Click on Execution Tab 5. Assign Traffic to Control Version and Save 6. Launch B2C Application 7. Verify Control Version is displayed on B2C 8. Hit Conversion URL and Submit Order 9. Check for the Total Trafficc, Unique Traffic, Test Conversion & Total Purchases in the Admin 10. Check for the Tally count in the DB Table
step.expectedresults: 1. Verify in Admin Total Traffic, Unique Traffic, Test Conversion & Total Purchases are getting increased correctly

testcase.name: PEBL-3677-21
testcase.summary:
Element Test

To Verify if a Element test with "Path & Query String" option saved and works on B2C

step.actions:
1. Launch Admin
2. Navigate to Marketing > A/B Testing
3. Click on Add new Test from Actions Menu
4. Fill all the mandatory's ,Select Page Type as 'Element',
set Test Page as Home Page.
5. Select "Path & Query String" option from the Select drop down of Conversion Page field
6. Enter Conversion URL as /product/%5Ben_us%5Decoclear+2000++%281450+gph%29%5Ben_us%5D.do?sortby=our Picks
7. Add Test Version and Select Elements from Element Selector Window and Save Changes
8. Activate Test , Assign Traffic , preview it and Save Changes
9. Clear cookies and Launch B2C Application
10. Verify  the Test Page displays on the Home Page
11. Now navigate to conversion Page
12. In Admin,Verify the Test Conversion count in the Results Tab of Test running
step.expectedresults: Test Conversion count should increased in Admin

testcase.name: PEBL-3066-1
testcase.summary:
Verify that query string is included for following and Test Version displayed correctly on B2C
Page Type Test for Home Page
testcase.preconditions: Page Type Test for Home Page in session

step.actions: 1. Launch Admin Applications 2. Navigate to Sites > Home > Display 3. Add Page Display and assign different elements to display 4. Navigate to Admin - Marketing - A/B testing - Details Tab 5. Create Page Type Test for newly created Display 6. Enter Test Page URL as /home.do?test=abcd 7. Save Test, Assign Traffic, Activate Test 8. Clear cookies and Launch B2C Application 9. Verify Home page is displayed but Test Version not displayed 10 Now Enter URL with query parameters i.e. /home.do?test=abcd 11. Now again verify Home page
step.expectedresults: 1. Verify Test Version is displayed correctly on B2C 2. Verify count also increased in Test Traffic for Test Version

testcase.name: PEBL-3066-2
testcase.summary:
Verify that query string is included for following and Test Version displayed correctly on B2C
Page Type Test for Directory Page
testcase.preconditions: Page Type Test for Directory Page in session

step.actions: 1. Launch Admin Applications 2. Navigate to Sites > Categories > Category 1 > Display 3. Add Page Display and assign different elements to display 4. Navigate to Admin - Marketing - A/B testing - Details Tab 5. Create Page Type Test for newly created Display 6. Enter Test Page URL as /category/%5Ben_us%5Dcategory1%5Ben_us%5D.do?test=abcd 7. Save Test, Assign Traffic, Activate Test 8. Clear cookies and Launch B2C Application 9. Navigate to Category 1 10. Verify Category 1 page is displayed but Test Version not displayed 11 Now Enter URL with query parameters i.e. /category/%5Ben_us%5Dcategory1%5Ben_us%5D.do?test=abcd 12. Now again verify Category1 page
step.expectedresults: 1. Verify Test Version is displayed correctly on B2C 2. Verify count also increased in Test Traffic for Test Version

testcase.name: PEBL-3066-3
testcase.summary: Verify that query string is included for following and Test Version displayed correctly on B2C Page Type Test for Index Page
testcase.preconditions: Page Type Test for Index Page in session

step.actions: 1. Launch Admin Applications 2. Navigate to Sites > Categories > Category 1 > Sub Category 2 > Display 3. Add Page Display "Directory LeftNav 02" and assign different elements to Fillslot 4. Navigate to Admin - Marketing - A/B testing - Details Tab 5. Create Page Type Test for newly created Display 6. Enter Test Page URL as /category/%5Ben_us%5Dcategory1%5Ben_us%5D/%5Ben_us%5Dsubcategory2%5Ben_us%5D.do?pp=12&sortby=newArrivals&sortType=1 7. Save Test, Assign Traffic, Activate Test 8. Clear cookies and Launch B2C Application 9. Navigate to Category 1 > Sub Category 2 10. Verify Category 1 page is displayed but Test Version not displayed 11 Now Enter URL with query parameters i.e. /category/%5Ben_us%5Dcategory1%5Ben_us%5D/%5Ben_us%5Dsubcategory2%5Ben_us%5D.do?pp=12&sortby=newArrivals&sortType=1 12. Now again verify Category1 > Sub Category 2 page
step.expectedresults: 1. Verify Test Version is displayed correctly on B2C 2. Verify count also increased in Test Traffic for Test Version

testcase.name: PEBL-3066-4
testcase.summary:
Verify that query string is included for following and Test Version displayed correctly on B2C
Page Type Test for No Search Result Page
testcase.preconditions: Page Type Test for No Search Result Page in session

step.actions: 1. Launch Admin Applications 2. Navigate to Sites > Additional Displays > No Search Results > Display 3. Inactivate all existing Displays 4. Add Page Display and assign different elements to display 5. Navigate to Admin - Marketing - A/B testing - Details Tab 6. Create Page Type Test for newly created Display 7. Enter Test Page URL as /search.do?query=abcdef 8. Save Test, Assign Traffic, Activate Test 9. Clear cookies and Launch B2C Application 10. Search for keyword "abcdef" 11. Verify No Search Result Page displayed with URL /search.do?query=abcdef 12. Verify Display displayed on No Search Result Page
step.expectedresults: 1. Verify Test Version is displayed correctly on B2C 2. Verify count also increased in Test Traffic for Test Version

testcase.name: PEBL-3249-17
testcase.summary: Verify Total Traffic, Unique Traffic, Test Conversion & Total Purchases gets incremented correctly for Control Version

step.actions: 1. Launch Admin Applications 2. Navigate to Sites > Home > Display 3. Add Page Display and assign different elements to display 4. Navigate to Admin - Marketing - A/B testing - Details Tab 5. Create Page Type Test for newly created Display 6. Click on Execution Tab 7. Assign Traffic to Control Version and Save 8. Launch B2C Application 9. Verify Control Version is displayed on B2C 10. Hit Conversion URL and Submit Order 11. Check for the Total Trafficc, Unique Traffic, Test Conversion & Total Purchases in the Admin 12. Check for the Tally count in the DB Table
step.expectedresults: 1. Verify in Admin Total Traffic, Unique Traffic, Test Conversion & Total Purchases are getting increased correctly

testcase.name: PEBL-3249-18
testcase.summary: Page Type Test - Verify count should be incremented only if Test Version is in session

step.actions: 1. Launch Admin Applications 2. Navigate to Sites > Home > Display 3. Add Page Display and assign different elements to display 4. Navigate to Admin - Marketing - A/B testing - Details Tab 5. Create Page Type Test for newly created Display 6. Save Test, Assign 50% Traffic and Activate Test 7. Clear cookies and Launch B2C Application 8. Verify Page Type Test displayed on B2C 9. Verify in Admin Unique and Total Traffic for Test Versions
step.expectedresults: 1. Verify Test Version is displayed correctly on B2C 2. Verify Unique and Total Traffic are increased correctly in Admin for Test Version

testcase.name: PEBL-3249-19
testcase.summary: Page Type Test - Verify Participants that are not in the test will see the same content as those in the control group but will not increment any totals.

step.actions: 1. Launch Admin Applications 2. Navigate to Sites > Home > Display 3. Add Page Display and assign different elements to display 4. Navigate to Admin - Marketing - A/B testing - Details Tab 5. Create Page Type Test for newly created Display 6. Save Test, Assign 50% Traffic and Activate Test 7. Clear cookies and Launch B2C Application 8. Verify Test Version is not in session and Control Group is displayed on B2C 9. Verify in Admin Unique and Total Traffic for Test Versions
step.expectedresults: 1. Verify Control Display is displayed correctly on B2C 2. Verify Unique and Total Traffic are not increased in Admin for Test Version

testcase.name: PEBL-3249-20
testcase.summary: Element Type Test - Control Group count should getting increased correctly as it was previously incremented

step.actions: 1. Launch Admin Applications 2. Navigate to Admin - Marketing - A/B testing - Details Tab 3. Create Element Type Test for Company Logo 4. Save Test, Assign 50% Traffic and Activate Test 5. Clear cookies and Launch B2C Application 6. Verify Element Type Test displayed on B2C 7. Verify in Admin Unique and Total Traffic is increased by one 8. Now again clear cookies and Launch B2C Application 9. Verify Control Group is displayed on B2C 10. Verify in Admin Unique and Total Traffic
step.expectedresults: 1. Verify Control Display is displayed correctly on B2C 2. Verify Unique and Total Traffic are increased in Admin for Element Test - Control Version

testcase.name: PEBL-3249-21
testcase.summary: Verify Add New Test in current window will open on "Add Test" selection from right flyout menu

step.actions: 1. Navigate to Admin - Marketing - A/B testing 2. Click on the Action menu in right upper corner 3. Click on " Add New Test" option
step.expectedresults: 1. Add New Test will open in current window

testcase.name: PEBL-3249-22
testcase.summary: To Verify the Browser cookies when new session is started after clearing cookies

step.actions: 1. Launch Admin Application 2. Navigate to Sites > Display > Create new Display for Home Page 3. Assigned Test to Fillslot to differentiate. 4. Navigate to Marketing > A/B testing > Crate New Page Type Test for Home Page 5. Set Test Page as /home.do and Conversion Page as /basket.do, create version, assign Template and Save Changes 6.On Executing Tab, Assign Traffic and activate Test 7. Delete Cookies & Launch B2C Application 8. Verify browser Cookies
step.expectedresults: Verify abtest, abtestversion and abtestevaltests cookie should be displayed

testcase.name: PEBL-3249-23
testcase.summary: To Verify the Display on B2C when Control Version is in session.

step.actions: 1. Launch Admin Application 2. Navigate to Sites > Display > Create new Display for Home Page 3. Assigned Test to Fillslot to differentiate. 4. Navigate to Marketing > A/B testing > Crate New Page Type Test for Home Page 5. Create Version and assign new Display 6. On Executing Tab, assign 50% traffic to Test Version rest 50 % will be assigned to Control 7. Activate Test, delete cookies and Launch B2C Application 8. Verify Test Version is displayed with new Display and in Browser cookies abtestversion is displayed as "100001,1" 9. Delete cookies and again Launch B2C Application
step.expectedresults: Default Display should be displayed when Control Version is in session.

testcase.name: PEBL-3249-24
testcase.summary: To Verify Control Version for each Test Version created

step.actions: 1. Launch Admin Application 2. Navigate to Sites > Display > Create Two new Displays for Home Page 3. Assigned Test to Fillslot to differentiate. 4. Navigate to Marketing > A/B testing > Crate New Page Type Test for Home Page 5. Create Two Versions and assign new Displays to them 6. On Executing Tab, Verify Test Versions displayed
step.expectedresults: One Control Version per Test should be created

testcase.name: PEBL-3249-25
testcase.summary: To Test if the Test is activated only after Test Version preview.

step.actions: 1. Launch Admin Applications 2. Navigate to Sites > Display 3. Add Page Display and assign different elements to Fillslot 4. Navigate to Admin - Marketing - A/B testing - Details Tab 5. Create Page Type Test for newly created Display, Save Test 6. On Execution Tab, Activate Test, Assign Traffic, Preview Test Version and Save
step.expectedresults: Test should be activated after Test Version preview.

testcase.name: PEBL-3249-26
testcase.summary: To Verify if the Traffic is displayed as per Traffic assigned.

step.actions: 1. Launch Admin Application 2. Navigate to Sites > Display > Create new Display for Home Page 3. Assigned Test to Fillslot to differentiate. 4. Navigate to Marketing > A/B testing > Crate New Page Type Test for Home Page 5. Create Version and assign new Display 6. On Executing Tab, assign 100% traffic to Test Version leave 0% assigned to Control 7. Save Changes 8. Click somewhere else and again check Traffic Percentage assigned to Test Version and Control Version
step.expectedresults: Traffic displayed should be as per Traffic assigned.

testcase.name: PEBL-3249-27
testcase.summary: To Verify the total Purchases for Version

step.actions:
1. Launch Admin Application 2. Navigate to Sites > Display > Create Two new Displays for Home Page 3. Assigned Test to Fillslot to differentiate. 4. Navigate to Marketing > A/B testing > Crate New Page Type Test for Home Page 5.On Executing Tab, Assign Traffic and activate Test 6. Launch B2C Application 7. Add 106d product into basket and proceed to checkout 8. Verify on Review and Submit order page,
Merchandise Subtotal is displayed as $31.79
Order Total is displayed $42.00 (which includes Shipping & Tax charges)
9. Now submit Order and verify Total Purchases for Version
step.expectedresults: Order total should be displayed as Total Purchases.

testcase.name: PEBL-3249-28
testcase.summary: To verify Test Conversion & Conversion % in Admin for particular Test Version

step.actions: 1. Launch Admin Application 2. Navigate to Sites > Display > Create new Display for Home Page 3. Assigned Test to Fillslot to differentiate. 4. Navigate to Marketing > A/B testing > Crate New Page Type Test for Home Page 5. Set Test Page as /home.do and Conversion Page as /basket.do, create version, assign Template and Save Changes 6.On Executing Tab, Assign Traffic and activate Test 7. Launch B2C Application 8. Add 106d product into basket and proceed to checkout 9. Wait for few minutes and verify Test Conversion & Conversion % in Admin for particular Test Version
step.expectedresults: Test Conversion & Conversion % should be updated correctly

Add Left Nav Page Display and assign different elements to display 7. Navigate to Admin - Marketing - A/B testing - Details Tab 8. Create Page Type Test for newly created Display 9. Save Test, Assign Traffic and Activate Test 10. Clear cookies and Launch B2C Application
step.expectedresults: 1. Verify Home Page displayed correctly 2. Verify no exceptions in logs

Create Element Type display for Home Page 7. Save Test, Assign Traffic and Activate Test 8. Clear cookies and Launch B2C Application
step.expectedresults: 1. Verify Home Page displayed correctly 2. Verify no exceptions in logs

testcase.name: PEBL-3677-1
testcase.summary: Verify Radio button for Element Test Type displayed correctly

step.actions: 1. Launch Admin 2. Navigate to Marketing > A/B Testing 3. Click on Add new Test from Actions Menu 4. Observe the radio button for Element Test Type
step.expectedresults: Radio button for Element Test Type present

testcase.name: PEBL-3677-2
testcase.summary: Verify Element Selector window open up correctly when Element type selected as option form Test Type

step.actions: 1. Launch Admin 2. Navigate to Marketing > A/B Testing 3. Click on Add new Test from Actions Menu 4. Click on Element radio button under Test Type 5. Verify under Version(s), "Select" button is displayed in front of "Version Element(s)" 6. Click on Select Button 7. Verify Element Selector window open up correctly 8. Verify Elements can be selected from Element Selector Window
step.expectedresults: 1. "Select" button is displayed in front of "Version Element(s)" 2. Element Selector window open up correctly 3. Elements can be selected from Element Selector Window

testcase.name: PEBL-3677-3
testcase.summary: Verify Stylesheet Drop down removed and no more displayed

step.actions: 1. Launch Admin 2. Navigate to Marketing > A/B Testing 3. Click on Add new Test from Actions Menu 4. Click on Element radio button under Test Type 5. Verify Stylesheet Drop Down for each Version
step.expectedresults: Stylesheet drop down have been removed

testcase.name: PEBL-3677-4
testcase.summary: Add New Test Window Verify Read Only Control Version displayed for Element Tests

step.actions: 1. Launch Admin 2. Navigate to Marketing > A/B Testing 3. Click on Add new Test from Actions Menu 4. Click on Element radio button under Test Type 5. Fill all the Mandatory Information 7. Click on Select button for Control Version to Select Control Version Elements 8. Select Elements from Element Selector Window and Press Ok 9. Verify Read Only Control Version displayed
step.expectedresults: Read Only Control Version displayed correctly on Add New Test Window

testcase.name: AB_Test_PSPD-7038
testcase.summary: To verify that AB test is not saved until user provide some value for version name

step.actions:
1. Launch Admin
2. Navigate to Marketing -> AB Testing
3. Click on Add new test from right fly out
4. Enter name , description, select page type, enter test and conversion page
5. Leave the version name field blank and select the display
6. Click on on save button without entering the version name.
7. Repeat the same steps for Element type test
step.expectedresults:
1. AB test should not be saved for both element and page type test. E
2.Error pop-up should be displayed warning user about blank version name.
